name: Jun/Mid Python Developer (Automation Engineer)
description:
June Homes is a post Series-B company that’s using technology to challenge antiquated practices and improve the rental experience for everyday consumers and mom-and-pop landlords. Backed by some of the world's leading investors including Softbank Ventures Asia, FJ Labs, and Kairos, June Homes is on a mission to build the world’s largest housing company without owning a single property.

About the role:

June Homes is looking for an Automation Engineer who will develop, maintain, QA, post and update our product inventory in several platforms, portals and websites where we promote our property listings. This role reports directly to the Head Project Manager within the Growth & Performance Marketing team.

What you’ll do:

  • Develop and maintain Selenium/Python software for data collection and manipulation with the purpose to automate manual work of the Content & Listings team
  • Maintain Listings Database developed with Django, Django Rest Framework
  • Work with Django templates
  • Participate in QA process of IT team
  • Post new inventory on our website and across classifieds platforms where we are present
  • Keep listings updated as our inventory availability changes
  • Track and monitor results

What you need to be successful:

  • Intermediate knowledge of Python 3
  • At least 1 year of experience in data collection / parsing using technologies such as Selenium, XPath, JSON, XML, APIs
  • Basic knowledge of Django and Django Rest Framework
  • Basic knowledge of SQL
  • Strong spoken and written English – all communication will be held in English
  • Excellent team communication skills
  • Accuracy and sharp attention to details
  • Experience working remotely
  • Powerful laptop with min 8Gb memory and CPU Intel i5 4 cores or equivalent
  • University degree in computing or natural sciences would be a plus

What we offer:

  • Remote-first team

  • Competitive compensation + benefits

  • Stock options

  • High growth, VC backed startup experience

  • Opportunity for limitless professional growth and development

  • A diverse and inclusive environment where you can bring your whole self to work

  • Hours:

    Monday - Friday: 1am – 10am Eastern Time (NYC time)

    Monday - Friday: 6am – 3pm Eastern Time (NYC time)

June Homes is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of race, gender, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.
